settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-1-: Welcome to the guided tour. Click next button to begin.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-2-: This panel allows you to search across all records.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-3-: This filer allows you to limit search by particular location.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-4-: This filer allows you to specify search term.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-5-: Lets try to search for something, enter your term into this field and press ENTER.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-6-: You are landed on search results page, click next to proceed.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-7-: There you can see your search summary.
settlein-tours-tour-settleintest-step-8-: And there you can check what was found for your query.
